cleaned_text: micronutrients and algae 27,54 € (423,66 € / kg, Price shown includes 7% VAT. - [Excludes delivery costs](/info/delivery-distribution)) Features & Advantages - Contains evening primrose oil & various herbs - For the normal preservation of skin & hair Item no.: XEV-WEY-Human-26, Content: 60 Capsules, EAN: 4260614540989 Description This product is a combination of micronutrients, algae, evening primrose oil and herbs. - Biotin contributes to the maintenance of normal skin, hair, mucous membranes, as well as to a normal function of the nervous system and the psyche. Trace elements in right proportion to each other The trace elements zinc, copper and manganese were added to the formula in a special ratio to one another. - Zinc helps maintain normal hair, nails and skin. - Copper contributes to the maintenance of normal hair and skin pigmentation. - Together with manganese, copper contributes to normal connective tissue health. Fresh and sea algae The algae Schizochytrium limacinum is a cultivated algae grown for the natural extraction of docosahexaenoic acid, a polyunsaturated fatty acid, which is found mainly in wild fish and marine algae. The spirulina algae from Burmese wild growth contains spirulan, a polysaccharide, which has been scientifically investigated by two German universities (Prof Dr Pulz, Dr. PJ Mewes (Health Forum for Orthomolecular Medicine, No. 2006/116). The algae are a high-quality component of this recipe. Coenzyme Q10 and polyphenols from fruits Coenzyme Q 10, also called ubiquinone, is structurally related to vitamin K and vitamin E. It is either formed by the body itself or is absorbed by the diet and is anchored in the cell membrane of the mitochondria. Coenzyme Q10 is involved as a coenzyme in the formation of ATP and is present in cells with a particularly high energy requirement (heart, liver, lung). This product contains 30 mg per capsule. Grape seeds contain oligomers of proanthocyanidins, which serve the plant as UV protection. The mango fruit contains xanthones. Xanthones are among the polyphenols. This product was rounded off by silicon-containing bamboo shoots and horsetail. - limacinum algae (DHA contained) 6.5% - 6,4% Milk Thistle - 6,4% Chondroitin sulfate - Zinc gluconate 5,2% (75% gluconate - Biotin - Chromium piccolinate Questions & Answers about Dr. Weyrauch No. 26 Princess Happiness Customer Reviews English reviews written for Dr. Weyrauch No. 26 Princess Happiness Related products Magazine Articles: Discover Ayurveda 101 : Free delivery in Germany from 49,90 € Free returns 24-hour shipping More than 6.950 products
